title: (x) Fonts similar to Co Headline (Dalton Maag)? - FF Cocon, Barmeno {Ramiro, Jean Paul B}
content:

comments.content:
I think FF Cocon is the closest relative.

Ramiro.

Sorry, wrong link for Barmeno. Use this one:
